text: Tajin katzijon na ri Jesús are xopan ri Judas, jun chike ri e kabꞌlajuj tijoxelabꞌ. E rachiꞌl bꞌik sibꞌalaj e kꞌi winaq, ri e taqtal bꞌik kumal ri e kꞌamal taq kibꞌe ri e chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq, xuqujeꞌ ri e kꞌamal taq bꞌe rech ri tinimit, kukꞌaꞌm taq bꞌik sakꞌibꞌal xuqujeꞌ cheꞌ.
